message: Bob, I believe this product will be highly valuable to your portfolio.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,400,000. This is a significant discount compared to what others would be willing to pay.
I'm interested in the product, but $1,400,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider letting it go for $1,350,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $1,350,000. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
